I am Guo Yuchao. I completed my undergraduate studies at Northeast Agricultural University and my master's degree in the research group of Professor Wenke Zhang at the National Key Laboratory of Supramolecular Structure and Materials, Jilin University. My main research direction is polymer force chemistry and the adjustment of the activation efficiency of force-sensitive groups based on the topological structure of polymer networks


## Background

- 2023-2026: M.S. in chemistry, Jilin University, China.
- 2019-2023: Bachelor of chemistry, Northeast Agricultural University, China.
